attributes.action: reduce fish quotas around the UK by 25% year on year over the next 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To reduce the fish quotas of fish legally caught in UK waters by 25% year on year over the next 10 years.
 To allow some stocks to begin to recover. Much tighter control of all fishing grounds to provent quotas from being breached by foreign trawlers, all trawlers caught to be impounded and very heavy legal penaltys to be impossed, and  trawlers owners/captain to be banned for live from futher fishing.To look at farming fish in protected areas of UK waters to help in the restoration of fish stocks for future generations
